title: Diamond as Big as the Ritz - Hades too small

content.prompt: In context, the statement “Hades . . . gifted son” in the last sentence of the first paragraph is best interpreted as expressing the

choices.label: narrator’s belief that John is exceptional
indulgent view that Mr. and Mrs. Unger hold toward John
inevitability of John’s later successes in life
narrator’s criticism of small towns such as Hades

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
